LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class

ITEM.SOURCE: ` DATA i_condition TYPE REF TO ygplimt_startconditions. super->merge_with( conditions ). TRY. i_condition ?= conditions. bloc_size = i_condition->bloc_size. weight_fieldname = i_condition->weight_fieldname. CATCH cx_sy_move_cast_error. * Ignore this error ENDTRY.

` DATA o_start TYPE REF TO ygplimt_startconditions.
super->ygplimt_conditions~deserialize( xml ).
TRY. o_start ?= deserialized_object. set_bloc_size( o_start->bloc_size ). set_weight_fieldname( o_start->weight_fieldname ). set_servers( o_start->servers ). CATCH cx_sy_move_cast_error. ENDTRY.
